base_files.manage_py: Django manage.py: import os, sys, set DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE to '{project_name}.settings', import execute_from_command_line, call it with sys.argv. Python only.
base_files.settings_py: Django settings.py: BASE_DIR, SECRET_KEY, DEBUG=True, ALLOWED_HOSTS=['*'], INSTALLED_APPS (admin, auth, contenttypes, sessions, messages, staticfiles, rest_framework), MIDDLEWARE (standard), ROOT_URLCONF='{project_name}.urls', TEMPLATES, WSGI_APPLICATION='{project_name}.wsgi.application', DATABASES (sqlite3), STATIC_URL, MEDIA_URL, REST_FRAMEWORK, create logs dir, LOGGING to logs/{project_name}.log. Python only.

base_files.asgi_py: Django asgi.py: import os, set DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE to '{project_name}.asgi', import get_asgi_application, create application. Python only.

rbac.description: Role and Permission models (NO custom User)

base_files.app_page: src/app/page.tsx: Home component with main (min-h-screen p-8), h1 'Welcome to {project_name}', p 'Check src/components for components'. Tailwind classes. TypeScript only.
base_files.globals_css: src/app/globals.css: @tailwind base, @tailwind components, @tailwind utilities. Basic body styles. CSS only.
base_files.readme: Next.js README.md for '{project_name}': title, description, setup (npm install, npm run dev), structure. Markdown.

button.description: reusable Button component with variants (primary, secondary, danger), sizes, loading state, disabled state

table.description: data Table component with sorting, pagination, search, row selection. Expects data prop as array of objects.

header.description: Header component with logo, navigation menu, user dropdown, responsive mobile menu

footer.description: Footer component with links, social media icons, copyright

loader.description: Loader component with spinner, skeleton, progress bar variants

sidebar.description: Sidebar component with navigation links, collapsible, icons, active state

login.description: Login page with email/password form, validation, remember me, forgot password link. Use useState for form state.

signup.description: Signup page with name, email, password, confirm password, terms checkbox, validation. Use useState for form state.

JSON only.

auth.description: Auth module with JWT, login, register, refresh token, guards

users.description: Users module with CRUD, User entity, password hashing

mail.description: Mail module with email sending, templates, queue

notifications.description: Notifications module with create, read, mark as read

upload.description: Upload module with file upload, validation, storage (local/S3)

logging.description: Logging module with Winston, log levels, file/console transport
